nodes.bodyText: I remember this was fixed earlier. Did we undo this somehow?
Yes. Got lost in the v4->master merge as discussed offline.

@mbhaskar  @moderakh  - I checked the PR logs - and this PR was never created against V4.
It was only fixed on v2 and v3 SDK, not on V4 SDK - https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-java/pulls?q=is%3Apr+author%3Ambhaskar+is%3Aclosed
